mission: Diversity, Equity & Inclusion is the core of the Tommy John culture. The committee of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion is committed to fostering an inclusive workplace in which all individuals are treated with dignity, respect, equality and equity. We recognize that differences in age, race, gender, nationality, sexual orientation, physical ability, thinking style and background is what enables Tommy John to achieve an optimal work environment and global connectivity. In such, we’re committed to attracting, developing and retaining employees that reflect these diversities, as paramount to the success of the business.The Diversity, Equity & Inclusion Committee strive to make sure all individuals are truly represented in all levels of management and personnel with attention to equal pay rates and responsibilities. We’re committed to external community outreach to make an impact. The Diversity, Equity & Inclusion mission is to make certain TJ will continue to be a leader in all that defines our employees and customers comfort.
